column4: hello,i had a question that is maybe too simple to find in documentation. i simply want to do  web dev in php sql etc and also learn about running the server side. i'd like to run the desktop version of ubunto but not sure that will let me run wamp like i did on winnt. can i use the desktop version and still run apache?
the only difference between the server and desktop ubuntus are the packages preloaded on the disk. you can add as many other different packages as you want
